title: Love of God
verses: John 3:16 (WEB) — “For God so loved the world, that he gave his one and only Son.”
Romans 5:8 (WEB) — “God commends his own love toward us… while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.”
1 John 3:1 (WEB) — “See how great a love the Father has given to us, that we should be called children of God.”
1 John 4:10 (WEB) — “In this is love: not that we loved God, but that he loved us and sent his Son…”
body: God’s love is the fountain of our salvation and the foundation of our assurance. Receive it freely in Christ and reflect it freely to others.
prayer: Father, let Your love define me. Root and ground my heart in Christ’s love, and make me a channel of that love today. Amen.
